top_stories.title: Anthropic and the Pentagon are reportedly arguing over Claude usage
top_stories.description: The apparent issue: whether Claude can be used for mass domestic surveillance and autonomous weapons.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: The apparent issue: whether Claude can be used for mass domestic surveillance and autonomous weapons.

top_stories.title: Structured outputs on Amazon Bedrock: Schema-compliant AI responses
top_stories.description: Today, we're announcing structured outputs on Amazon Bedrock—a capability that fundamentally transforms how you can obtain validated JSON responses from foundation models through constrained decoding for schema compliance. In this post, we explore the challenges of traditional JSON generation and how structured outputs solves them. We cover the two core mechanisms—JSON Schema output format and strict tool use—along with implementation details, best practices, and practical code examples.
top_stories.author: Jeffrey Zeng
top_stories.content: Today, we're announcing structured outputs on Amazon Bedrock—a capability that fundamentally transforms how you can obtain validated JSON responses from foundation models through constrained decoding for schema compliance. In this post, we explore the challenges of traditional JSON generation and how structured outputs solves them. We cover the two core mechanisms—JSON Schema output format and strict tool use—along with implementation details, best practices, and practical code examples.
